How it should work ? There could be room for growth in cryptocurrency based venture capital.It would be like the reality show Shark Tank. Where an inventor pitches an idea or invention to investors who can provide funding and financial backing. Except all support would be denominated in crypto. To produce profits in loan (or investment) markets, usually requires wealth multiplication of some type. In an ideal sense, the loan has a goal of multiplying the value of the loan beyond its initial value. Venture capital investment in inventions and ideas is one method of achieving this. But of course, there are other methods.Offering loans to professional house flippers, people who buy low cost goods at auction repair and upgrade to sell at profit. There are many established markets where loans can be offered to receive a return on investment.
